column4: Does the port is "taken" by the program that originates the connection?.
is that a local port forward, or remote? to my knowledge, if you forward a local port to the remote host's port, you can initiate as many connections as you'd like

no, this is a remote port. I think is a Firebird problem. The first test I did was connect to a database using Flamerobin, then connect to the same database using a sample program made by me, and I couldn't connect. But, if I connect with flamerobin to a different database, both programs can coexist.
hmm ok, i have no experience with that software, so can't really comment on that
